summary: Although Charlie and Lee are in Monaco for an art exhibit, they become caught up in a feud between rival financiers which involves the Chans in a web of blackmail and murder.
cast: Warner Oland|Keye Luke|Virginia Field|Sidney Blackmer|Harold Huber|Kay Linaker|Robert Kent|Edward Raquello|George Lynn|Louis Mercier|George Davis|John Bleifer|Georges Renavent|Edward Biby|Emil Bistagne|Eumenio Blanco|Eugene Borden|James Carlisle|Jack Chefe|André Cheron|Marcelle Corday|Gennaro Curci|Jean De Briac|Victor De Linsky|Art Dupuis|Fred Farrell|Antonio Filauri|Charles Fogel|Constant Franke|Robert Graves|Sherry Hall|Ramsay Hill|Alphonse Martell|Eric Mayne|Harold Miller|George Nardelli|Manuel París|Jean Perry|John Picorri|Albert Pollet|Joseph Romantini|George Sorel|Count Stefenelli|Leo White
title: Charlie Chan at Monte Carlo
